data.text: Bika Iseli kamona khini mu diambu di mvangi awu
Bika bazitisa dizina diandi mu makinu ;
bila Yave weti yangalala mu batu bandi,
Bika banlongo bamoma khan mu diambu di nzitusu wawu ;
Bika minzitusu mi Nzambi miba mu miunu miawu
mu diambu di vutula landi kuidi makanda
mu diambu di kanga mintinu miawu mu zisieni
mu diambu di dukisa nzengolo yoyi yisonama mu diambu diawu ;
